experiences.name: Stanley Park Seawall (Full Loop)
experiences.regret_message: If it rains, paths can be slippery. Full loop takes a full day, so bring water and snacks.

experiences.name: Granville Island & Public Market
experiences.regret_message: Indoor areas make it safe during rain. Avoid weekends if you dislike crowds.

experiences.name: Vancouver Art Gallery
experiences.regret_message: Great for rainy days. Skip if youâ€™re short on time.

experiences.name: Museum of Anthropology
experiences.regret_message: Allows full-day exploration. Rainy day friendly.

experiences.name: Capilano Suspension Bridge & Park
experiences.regret_message: Crowded on weekends. High-energy if you take trails; check visibility in fog.

experiences.name: Lynn Canyon Park Hike
experiences.regret_message: Slippery in rain. Full-day option for extended hike.

experiences.name: Grouse Mountain Skyride & Summit
experiences.regret_message: Check visibility; summit can be cold/windy. Full-day recommended if hiking trails included.

experiences.name: Grouse Grind Hike
experiences.regret_message: Physically demanding. Avoid in wet conditions. Full-day includes summit rest.

experiences.name: False Creek Ferry & Waterfront Walk
experiences.regret_message: Relaxing option. Rain or shine. Full-day allows multiple stops.

experiences.name: Queen Elizabeth Park
experiences.regret_message: Great gardens and viewpoints. Full-day allows leisure exploration.

experiences.name: North Shore Scenic Drive
experiences.regret_message: Driving route with optional short hikes. Full-day lets you explore multiple viewpoints.
